rules.description: An array of reportingDescriptor objects relevant to the analysis performed by the tool component.

taxa.description: An array of reportingDescriptor objects relevant to the definitions of both standalone and tool-defined taxonomies.

metricsDescriptors.description: An array of reportingDescriptor objects relevant to the metrics production performed by the tool component.

metrics.description: The set of metrics contained in an SARIF log. The metrics array may be absent when a tool run does not produce this data. It must be present (but may be empty) if a log file represents an actual metrics report.

metric.description: A reference to the metrics descriptor of which this metric is an instance.

baseline.description: The previously computed metric value, if any.

reportingDescriptor.description: Metadata that describes a specific report produced by the tool, as part of the analysis it provides or its runtime reporting.

id.description: A stable, opaque identifier for the report.

deprecatedIds.description: An array of stable, opaque identifiers by which this report was known in some previous version of the analysis tool.

guid.description: A unique identifer for the reporting descriptor in the form of a GUID.

deprecatedGuids.description: An array of unique identifies in the form of a GUID by which this report was known in some previous version of the analysis tool.

name.description: A report identifier that is understandable to an end user.

deprecatedNames.description: An array of readable identifiers by which this report was known in some previous version of the analysis tool.

shortDescription.description: A concise description of the report. Should be a single sentence that is understandable when visible space is limited to a single line of text.

fullDescription.description: A description of the report. Should, as far as possible, provide details sufficient to enable resolution of any problem indicated by the result.

messageStrings.description: A set of name/value pairs with arbitrary names. Each value is a multiformatMessageString object, which holds message strings in plain text and (optionally) Markdown format. The strings can include placeholders, which can be used to construct a message in combination with an arbitrary number of additional string arguments.

helpUri.description: A URI where the primary documentation for the report can be found.

help.description: Provides the primary documentation for the report, useful when there is no online documentation.

relationships.description: An array of objects that describe relationships between this reporting descriptor and others.

properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the report.

reportingDescriptorReference.description: Information about how to locate a relevant reporting descriptor.

index.description: The index into an array of descriptors in toolComponent.ruleDescriptors, toolComponent.notificationDescriptors, or toolComponent.taxonomyDescriptors, depending on context.

guid.description: A guid that uniquely identifies the descriptor.

toolComponent.description: A reference used to locate the toolComponent associated with the descriptor.

properties.description: Key/value pairs that provide additional information about the reporting descriptor reference.
